Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

High-Pass Filter

Discussion

This filter only allows frequencies above the cutoff frequency to pass.

Preferences:

"Highpass Cutoff": Cutoff Frequency. Range: 20.0 to 20000.0 Hz.


Group: Digital Filter Services
Related Sections: Band-Pass Filter, Low-Pass Filter, Resonator Filter
